fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Borders and Security
inter_groups: Freedom of Religion or Belief and Religious Tolerance
eu_initiatives: Equal Treatment Directive, Article 17 Dialogue, SDG negotiations for EU position.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: BÖLLMANN#Felix, CLARKE#Robert, DEN BLAUWEN#Leen, KUBY#Sophia, LEA#Jennifer, Neffe#Alice, PORTARU#Adina, PRICE#Lorcán, THONHAUSER#Andreas
goals__remit: ADF International is a not-for-profit international legal alliance of more than 2100 lawyers dedicated to the protection of fundamental human rights.
relevant_communication:
Briefing events, submission of briefing papers, amicus briefs and submissions of legal briefings at the CJEU and the ECHR. 
ADF International co-hosted events in the European Parliament: "You can't put a price on a baby's heart" on October 15 2015 in collaboration with the EPP Working Group on Bioethics and Human Dignity; "Genocide by Isis: Urgent need for International Action" on February 17 2016;  "Freedom of Conscience" on March 2 2016; Book Launch "Never Again.  Legal responses to a broken promise in the Middle East" on June 29 2016; Background Briefing "Conscientious Objection for Medical Staff" on October 19 2016. 
Contribution to the Annual Report on the State of Freedom of Religion or Belief in the World 2015, published in June 2016. 
Contribution to the Public consultation - 2016 Annual Colloquium on Fundamental Rights on ‘Media Pluralism and Democracy'
